question: Are women allowed to go to the masjid when they have their periods
answer:
QUESTION
Please refer the name of the hadith too
ANSWER


Share:
Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said, 'I do not permit the Musjid
for a menstruating woman and an impure (Junubi) person.' (Mishkaat vol.1)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
